spec_data.Name: texlive-varisize
spec_data.Description:
A series of files, each of which defines a size-change macro.
Note that 10point.tex is by convention called by one of the
other files, so that there's always a "way back".
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:46:33 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Change font size in Plain TeX
